mapper.select: SELECT DM.DOCUMENT_NUM AS "dmNum", DM.DOCUMENT_TITLE AS "dmTitle", APS.APPROVAL_NAME AS "apName", DOCUMENT_DATE AS "dmDate" FROM MM INNER JOIN DM ON MM.COMPANY_CODE = DM.COMPANY_CODE INNER JOIN APS ON DM.APPROVAL_CODE = APS.APPROVAL_CODE WHERE WRITER = '202103001' AND DOCUMENT_CODE='D'
